ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Crafting I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the crafting power of first-generation assemblers! These wonderful machines are the first step towards autonomous precision crafters.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
With this Research you have unlocked S.A.L automation robots.
Theese are a placeable robots you place on a workbench workercell, then they will start doing work on that bench.

This is added as a Tribute to S.A.L mod which where what Project RimFactory started as before it became assemblers as we know them today in PRF.
Settings and most things are taken directly from S.A.L mod but might be changed/tweaked later. Also it does not include miner, be feel free to ask if you think we miss them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Crafting II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Significant improvements on autonomous crafting machines will guarantee even better results through increased crafting precision and instructional accuracy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Specialization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Be able to access a limited yet specialized variant of S.A.L machines for your everyday industrial tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Art I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the ways of hypercomputing and neural networks, allowing machines to create proper semi-decent art.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Art II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combined with overclocking, make your neural networks react much faster, improving quality of art.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Automated Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Created specialized S.A.L machines tasked with mastering culinary art. Your colony will never go hungry again, guaranteed!

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Overclocking I
ResearchProjectDef.description: General S.A.L machines often work too slowly and can result in slow production. Upgrading them with the ability to overclock their operating systems, this will result in faster production speeds at the cost of some item quality.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Overclocking II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Intensifying the modification of S.A.L assembler's operation systems will allow for even quicker manufacturing speeds at the severe cost of item quality.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Prime Crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: After several rigorous hours of research, one can finally acquire the finest piece of machinery. Prime crafting introduces levels of manufacturing unknown to most of mankind. Only the most advanced societies in existence have achieved this miracle of engineering, but at what cost?
